title: NCAA Boise State Broncos Men's Rugby Hoodie
features: Slightly longer in the back with split waist for added comfort
description: The Oregon Rugby Hoodie is the ultimate show stopper in your closet. All Duck fans will want the comfort and warmth of their favorite Hoodie, with the style and fashion of a Striped Rugby. Official team colors constitute the stripes as well as official team logos on the chest and opposite sleeve. All the little, added extras make this hoodie unique. From the rubber buttons (like every official Rugby shirt has) to the reverse thermal weave inside the hood (for added pizzazz and warmth), to the split waist (for added style and comfort) this Rugby Hoodie will quickly become your favorite gear for game day. everyday.
